name: Pachter Lab
description: Working with Sina Booeshaghi and Prof Lior Pachter on a single-cell RNA-seq project with Kallisto. Developed a friendly wrapper around a popular scRNA-seq analysis pipeline (kb-python). Developing a repository for scRNA-seq data that will allow aggregation across multiple datasets.
bullet: Working with Sina Booeshagi and Prof. Lior Pachter on single-cell RNA-seq projects
Developed a friendly wrapper around a popular scRNA-seq analysis pipeline (kb-python)
Developing a repository for scRNA-seq data that will allow aggregation across multiple datasets
